RumorFact.Text: The Quantum Weather Lab was built to study how meteors from Hollow's Lantern are affected as the Quantum Moon orbits Brittle Hollow.
Ore from Timber Hearth was used in building a protective shell to protect the Quantum Weather Lab's interior from meteor impacts.
Nomai on the Quantum Weather Lab raised concerns about how the Quantum Moon could interfere with the Ash Twin Project.

ExploreFact.Text: The Quantum Moon exerts a significant gravitational force.
As the Quantum Moon orbits Brittle Hollow, its gravity pulls on meteors in orbit, causing discrepancies in where they land during a time loop.
The Nomai feared that the Quantum Moon could influence the trajectory of probes launched from the Orbital Probe Cannon, interfering with the Ash Twin Project.
The Nomai implemented a safeguard detecting when the Quantum Moon orbits Giant's Deep, to protect the Ash Twin Project from potential interference.
